Somebodys gonna be shot at the poker table. one has four aces in his hand A
A A A Kand the other has a royal flush. 10 J K Q A.  unless they're useing a
Pinochle deck there shouldn't be 5 aces.


----- Original Message -----
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Sent: Thursday, June 21, 2001 8:58 PM
Subject: Cybertronian Bar: Nice place, if your a Decepticon


> Caliburst lay down his hand hard. It read four aces, and a King. "Read
> it and weep boys." He said smugly. Two other same sized robots were
> around him, the larger slammed their hands down. "Damn it." He yelled
> yelled. "Well Tiptop, Heater, fork over your energon tips." Caliburst
> said with a smile ear to ear. As the robot began to do it, Heater put
> his hands on the chips. "Oh no, I don't lose at this kind of game." He
> said, laying down a royal flush in order.
>
> Slugslinger nursed his drink some more, and was now telling the robot
> who was desperate for it, a long ago story. Noises of robots shouting in
> the backround, something about cheatin. "Well, I remember, I was against
> 30 of the finnest Autobot pilots, when I pulled an amazing barrel role,
> and gave em all instant air conditioning." he said, remembering back
> fondly. "That's not how it went." A voice yelled from across the bar.
> Slugslinger looked up angrily, "Who dares to interupt SLugslinger,
> Decepticon pilot." He yelled, and was met by a fist to the mouth, which
> sent him toppling over. Through bluring optics he looked up, angrily,
> then calmed down. "Oh.. Hey Quake." he said, like the whole thing was
> normal.
>
> The one robot listening to Slugslinger got upset however. "Hey, I was
> listening to him." He said, as he got up, and in Quake's face. "Kid
> what's your name?" Quake asked. "Jagged, Why?"
>
> "Cause Im gonna rearange your face punk."
>
